test.name: TC6 Data driven check product name in hotspot sidebar SPE68B55UC

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Verify that user can choose the correct appliances by product hotspot
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//button[@class='zv-trigger zv-trigger-hotspot zv-trigger-250045620 c00177 has-tooltip']'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
